Name: Queer and Chill
About the game: Queer & Chill is a spicy and challenging puzzle full of pride flags, and lots of diversity. Improve your skills while discovering new and exciting ways to match people based on their sexuality. Learn, evolve, and most of all, be curious. FEATURES Party After Party: Test your match skills with more than 80 levels and challenges. Charming by Nature : People of all shades, sizes and colors. Rainbow Celebration: Discover different gender identities and sexualities: demisexual, asexual, autosexual, pansexual, abrosexual and aromantic people will be coloring the party with their pride flags. Dress Code: Unlock spicy and funny styles to dress up your parties, from Victorian underwear to furry characters and more. 'Do you need my help?' You can talk about gender identity, sexuality and another things with a companion to learn more about the game.
